speaker: CLEOPATRA
text_entry: ACT II

speaker: CLEOPATRA
text_entry: SCENE I. Messina. POMPEY's house.

speaker: CLEOPATRA
text_entry: Enter POMPEY, MENECRATES, and MENAS, in warlike manner

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: If the great gods be just, they shall assist

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: The deeds of justest men.

speaker: MENECRATES
text_entry: Know, worthy Pompey,

speaker: MENECRATES
text_entry: That what they do delay, they not deny.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Whiles we are suitors to their throne, decays

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: The thing we sue for.

speaker: MENECRATES
text_entry: We, ignorant of ourselves,

speaker: MENECRATES
text_entry: Beg often our own harms, which the wise powers

speaker: MENECRATES
text_entry: Deny us for our good; so find we profit

speaker: MENECRATES
text_entry: By losing of our prayers.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I shall do well:

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: The people love me, and the sea is mine;

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: My powers are crescent, and my auguring hope

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Says it will come to the full. Mark Antony

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: In Egypt sits at dinner, and will make

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: No wars without doors: Caesar gets money where

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: He loses hearts: Lepidus flatters both,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Of both is flatter'd; but he neither loves,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Nor either cares for him.

speaker: MENAS
text_entry: Caesar and Lepidus

speaker: MENAS
text_entry: Are in the field: a mighty strength they carry.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Where have you this? 'tis false.

speaker: MENAS
text_entry: From Silvius, sir.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: He dreams: I know they are in Rome together,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Looking for Antony. But all the charms of love,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Salt Cleopatra, soften thy waned lip!

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Let witchcraft join with beauty, lust with both!

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Tie up the libertine in a field of feasts,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Keep his brain fuming; Epicurean cooks

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Sharpen with cloyless sauce his appetite;

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: That sleep and feeding may prorogue his honour

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Even till a Lethe'd dulness!

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Enter VARRIUS

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: How now, Varrius!

speaker: VARRIUS
text_entry: This is most certain that I shall deliver:

speaker: VARRIUS
text_entry: Mark Antony is every hour in Rome

speaker: VARRIUS
text_entry: Expected: since he went from Egypt 'tis

speaker: VARRIUS
text_entry: A space for further travel.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I could have given less matter

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: A better ear. Menas, I did not think

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: This amorous surfeiter would have donn'd his helm

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: For such a petty war: his soldiership

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Is twice the other twain: but let us rear

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: The higher our opinion, that our stirring

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Can from the lap of Egypt's widow pluck

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: The ne'er-lust-wearied Antony.

speaker: MENAS
text_entry: I cannot hope

speaker: MENAS
text_entry: Caesar and Antony shall well greet together:

speaker: MENAS
text_entry: His wife that's dead did trespasses to Caesar;

speaker: MENAS
text_entry: His brother warr'd upon him; although, I think,

speaker: MENAS
text_entry: Not moved by Antony.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I know not, Menas,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: How lesser enmities may give way to greater.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Were't not that we stand up against them all,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: 'Twere pregnant they should square between

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: themselves;

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: For they have entertained cause enough

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: To draw their swords: but how the fear of us

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: May cement their divisions and bind up

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: The petty difference, we yet not know.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Be't as our gods will have't! It only stands

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Our lives upon to use our strongest hands.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Come, Menas.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Exeunt
